Key Match Events: The Rays led 3-0 until the bottom of the 6th inning when the Tigers scored two runs.
The Tigers then scored two in the bottom of the 8th inning to secure the win.
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers' magic number is now one. This means the Tigers just need to win one more game, or have the Minnesota Twins lose one more, to reach the postseason.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Detroit Tigers left fielder Matt Vierling (8) and Detroit Tigers shortstop Trey Sweeney (27) celebrate a scored run.
Detroit Tigers pitcher Jason Foley (68) celebrates a strike out.
Others: The game was played at Comerica Park on September 26, 2024.
